title: Strategies for Improving EFL Classroom Learning Outcomes Through Technology-Enhanced Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Designing Collaborative Learning Activities Feasible in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize collaborative problem-solving strategies with peers in technology-supported environments with 80% accuracy
Learners record 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) in weekly learning participation surveys in response to teachers' supportive interactions
Learners can achieve over 90% task completion rates based on adaptive help-seeking attitudes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
